definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Too many magazines like to feature sleek models on the cover.
sentences.chinese: 太多的雜誌喜歡用時尚模特兒作封面。

sentences.english: The clothes designer chose several models to try on his newly designed clothes.
sentences.chinese: 服裝設計師選了幾個模特來試穿他新設計的服裝。

sentences.english: It’s illegal to change the clothes on a storefront mannequin unless you draw the shades first.
sentences.chinese: 給前店的人體模特兒換衣服時必須有遮擋，否則違法。

sentences.english: The life-model for the painting of the figure of Jesus was hosen first.
sentences.chinese: 基督畫像的真人模特是第一位被遴選。

sentences.english: Shanghai Painting Art Academy uses nude model in its classes.
sentences.chinese: 上海圖畫美術院在教學中使用人體模特兒。

sentences.english: Hundreds of boxes of shoes. A mannequin.
sentences.chinese: 醫院病牀，幾百盒鞋子，人體模特。

sentences.english: Imes picked Rose from all the beautiful girls in the school to be a model.
sentences.chinese: 艾姆斯從全校那些美麗的女孩子中選中露絲做模特兒。

sentences.english: Oh, so they are just a new group of the model world.
sentences.chinese: 噢，那她們只是模特界的一個新興羣體。

sentences.english: Male models can use fade turns in combination to create a stunning runway walk.
sentences.chinese: 男模特可以使用淡入組合來創造一個驚人的跑道走。

sentences.english: My friends helped me take part into the 10th China Model Star Contest.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友們鼓勵我參加了第十屆中國模特大賽。

sentences.english: Long-stemmed models ankled though the lobby.
sentences.chinese: 身材修長的模特兒嫋嫋婷婷地走過大廳。

sentences.english: The Figure Model's Guild declares modelling to be "an art form in itself".
sentences.chinese: 人體模特協會宣稱“模特本身就是一種藝術形式”。

sentences.english: The Figure Model's Guild declares modelling to be "an art form in itself".
sentences.chinese: 人體模特協會宣稱“模特本身就是一種藝術形式”。

sentences.english: The guys and gals holding poses often have dramatic looks and body types.
sentences.chinese: 男女模特常常有驚豔的外表和身材。

sentences.english: But what kind of person becomes a figure model?
sentences.chinese: 那麼哪種人會成爲人體模特呢？

sentences.english: Does the De Zhou City family now image building need the marriage yarn model?
sentences.chinese: 德州現在哪家影樓需要婚紗模特啊？

definition: Matou town in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
a fashion show/to walk the runway (in a fashion show)
nude model/abbr. for 裸體模特|裸体模特[luo3 ti3 mo2 te4]
